item.description:
Meet to play Scrabble every Sunday.

The standard time is currently 4pm but it has been fluctuating in the last few weeks. If you are interested in joining, RSVP "yes" and what time you plan to be there. Some of us show up without RSVPing but there's no guarantee anyone will be there if not coordinated beforehand.

If there are other days/nights you would like to meet, please email me.

All levels of players are welcome.
item.name: Central CT Scrabble Meetup
